backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing shop, product, stock movement, and user profile storage with admin authorization and user profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the login UI update linking to the Super Admin portal.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including routing, layouts, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring React Query, the router, theming, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter name and email and saving the profile while preserving shopId.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Simple component rendering the RK Solutions logo image.
Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and main content for shop or admin roles.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with copyright notice and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, role-based navigation, offline and alert indicators, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Notificat: Bell icon showing total low-stock and out-of-stock alerts linked to the alerts page.
frontend/src/components/layout/OfflineIn: Indicator showing online/offline status and queued offline operations with link to sync page.
Dialog for recording a product sale by decreasing stock via updateStock mutation.
frontend/src/components/shop/StockInDial: Dialog for adding stock to a product using updateStock mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/offline/useNetworkSta: Hook that tracks online/offline network status using browser events.
frontend/src/hooks/offline/useOfflineQue: Hook maintaining a list of queued offline operations with a retry placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, shops, and analytics via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
Admin page placeholder showing upcoming access log functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHomePage.t: Admin dashboard linking to shop management and access logs with an access notice.
Displays all shops for admins, allowing suspension and reactivation with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AdminLoginPage.t: Provides an Internet Identity–based login page that redirects authenticated users to the admin portal.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ShopLoginPage.ts: Shop user login page supporting Internet Identity authentication and navigation to signup or admin login.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ShopSignUpPage.t: Handles two-step shop account creation: user authentication and shop registration with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AlertsPage.tsx: Shows low-stock and out-of-stock product alerts with links to restock individual items.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DashboardPage.ts: Displays shop overview metrics and quick access to product management and stock alerts.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductCreatePag: Form page that lets a shop owner create a new product with name, description, initial quantity, and low‑stock threshold, then submits via createProduct and navigates back to the product list.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Displays detailed information for a product, including stock status and recent movements, with actions for editing, recording sales, and stock‑in events.
Provides a form for editing an existing product’s name, description, and low‑stock threshold, loading initial values and saving updates via updateProduct.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all shop products with search and stock‑status filtering, and supports viewing, editing, and deleting products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/SyncStatusPage.t: Shows online/offline status and queued offline operations, with options to retry sync and view operation details and errors.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree for auth, shop, and admin sections, including layouts with identity checks and profile-setup gating.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash segments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current MVP scope, architecture, known issues, and implemented features for an inventory SaaS system.
